FuncDef:
The iqcn enable command enables the iQCN function in the interface view.
The undo iqcn enable command disables the iQCN function in the interface view. The iqcn enable command enables the iQCN function in the interface view. The undo iqcn enable command disables the iQCN function in the interface view. By default, the iQCN function is disabled on an interface. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo: After the iQCN function is enabled globally, you need to enable the iQCN function in the interface view to implement the iQCN function.
